content.title: Annual Report
content.description: The 2022 Annual Report is a larger-scale magazine that incorporates both the traditional article format, as well as donor information, statistics, and infographics. At a whopping 40 pages, this is my largest magazine project to date! I am also very proud of this project because it marked a shift in my mindset for magazine production, trying to replicate the feel of a collegiate publication more so than my previous works. I not only designed this whole magazine, but also contributed my writing skills to several articles.
content.skills: Graphic Design, Magazine Layouts, Magazine Editing, Copywriting, Article Writing, Typography Design, Print Production

content.title: TODAY Magazine
content.description: The Fall 2023 edition of TODAY Magazine was a more in depth experience for me as a designer, as I took a more hands on approach with some of the articles and the content for the layouts. For example, I got to coordinate and photograph people that were featured in articles, and stage my vision in such a way that it became a reality on the printed pages.
content.alt: St. Joes Fall 2023 TODAY Magazine cover
content.skills: Graphic Design, Magazine Layouts, Magazine Editing, Copywriting, Article Writing, Typography Design, Print Production, Magazine Photography

content.title: TODAY Magazine
content.description: The Summer 2023 edition of TODAY Magazine contains content from the second half of the academic year. Since the previous edition of the magazine, I spent a lot of time reading other academic magazines to gain inspiration for the creation of new styles of layouts for this run. I tried new editing techniques to create a visually appealing magazine that I could be proud of.
content.alt: St. Joes Summer 2023 TODAY Magazine cover
content.skills: Graphic Design, Magazine Layouts, Magazine Editing, Copywriting, Article Writing, Typography Design, Print Production

content.title: TODAY Magazine
content.description: The Fall 2022 Edition of the TODAY Magazine was my second run through of the publication, and I had picked up many tricks of the trade since my first edition in the Summer of 2022. As our “Back to School Edition”, it features several articles that update students, alumni, and friends about what Saint Joseph High School had planned for the new year.
content.alt: St. Joes Fall 2022 TODAY Magazine cover
content.skills: Graphic Design, Magazine Layouts, Magazine Editing, Copywriting, Article Writing, Typography Design, Print Production

content.title: TODAY Magazine
content.description: The Summer 2022 Edition of the TODAY Magazine will always hold a special place in my designer’s heart, as it was the first full length magazine I got to design for! In college I had primarily thought of myself as a video editor, but when I joined Saint Joseph High School’s Communications and Marketing team, I was given the opportunity to design all their magazine publications and I fell in love with print media. This first edition presented me with many challenges to overcome, especially having only worked briefly with magazines when I took an elective at RIT dedicated to them. Looking back there are many things I would do differently, but I learned more from this project than potentially anything else I have worked on.
content.alt: St. Joes Summer 2022 TODAY Magazine cover
content.skills: Graphic Design, Magazine Layouts, Magazine Editing, Copywriting, Typography Design, Print Production

content.title: Admissions Viewbook
content.description: The 2023 Admissions Viewbook was a project where I was tasked with perfecting the previous year’s publication. I had to go through each spread, determining if it should be updated or completely revamped. Additionally, new admissions processes and programs had to be implemented, resulting in new original spreads. It is used as a sales piece to gather interest in prospective families and present the “Saint Joe’s Experience” to them.
content.skills: Graphic Design, Magazine Layouts, Magazine Editing, Copywriting, Typography Design, Print Production

content.title: Admissions Viewbook
content.description: The 2022 Admissions Viewbook, being my second magazine produced during my career, proposed new challenges and concepts to consider. The Viewbook serves the purpose of being the main printed source of information for prospective families. It walks families through the ins and outs of what makes Saint Joseph High School a unique experience and the offerings that are in store. Compared to the TODAY Magazine and Annual Reports, it is more of a sales piece than a traditional article based magazine. I had to take this all into consideration when deciding on which spreads to update from previous years and which ones to recreate entirely.
content.skills: Graphic Design, Magazine Layouts, Magazine Editing, Copywriting, Typography Design, Print Production

content.title: Gala Ad Journal
content.description: The Green Tie Gala 2023 Ad Journal is a print publication that features the ads and messages of Saint Joseph High School’s donors at our annual fundraising gala. I was responsible for coordinating with donors to see what they wanted in their printed ad. For most ads, I used provided logos to create congratulatory messages from the donor to the honorees of the gala. There were also several pages of original content. I managed this project and saw it through from inception to completion.
content.alt: St. Joes 2023 Gala Ad Journal Cover
content.skills: Graphic Design, Magazine Layouts, Magazine Editing, Copywriting, Typography Design, Print Production

content.title: Gala Ad Journal
content.description: The Green Tie Gala 2022 Ad Journal is a print publication that features the ads and messages of Saint Joseph High School’s donors at our annual fundraising gala. This project took a lot more “project management”, as I was responsible for connecting with donors who purchased an ad, communicating with them what they were looking for, designing the ad, getting approval, and figuring out a pagination with my supervisor.
content.alt: St. Joes 2022 Gala Ad Journal Cover
content.skills: Graphic Design, Magazine Layouts, Magazine Editing, Copywriting, Typography Design, Print Production

content.title: Wrestling Post
content.description: When the Saint Joseph High School wrestling team was heading to the Beast of the East tournament, I created this graphic to hype up the event to our student fanbase. This graphic was very fun to make because of how many different styles and effects went into the photo manipulation. It can be seen on @stjoesmetuchen on Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter.
content.skills: Graphic Design, Typography Design, Photo Manipulation, Social Media Management

content.title: Falcon Spotlight
content.description: This graphic was the first in a social media series that highlights accomplished students at Saint Joseph High School. It featured Class of 2023 member Mark Gialluisi as one of our star athletes on the baseball team. One of my Advanced Journalism students wrote a feature article on him that went onto our school website (www.stjoes.org), and this graphic was used for social media to promote the article. It can be seen on @stjoesmetuchen on Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter.
content.skills: Graphic Design, Typography Design, Social Media Management

content.title: Prom Post
content.description: This graphic was created to promote the 2023 senior prom at Saint Joseph High School. This graphic stands out to me because I got to experiment with vector graphics, color, and depth. It can be seen on @stjoesmetuchen on Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter.
content.skills: Graphic Design, Typography Design, Social Media Management

content.title: Giving Tuesday Post
content.description: This graphic was created to promote the 2023 Giving Tuesday campaign in support of a new weight room, The Barn. It was a part of a series that featured the voices of the students on what a new facility would mean to them. It can be seen on @stjoesmetuchen on Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter.
content.skills: Graphic Design, Typography Design, Social Media Management

content.title: Facebook Ad
content.description: This graphic was created as a Facebook ad to get prospective families interested in Saint Joseph High School’s Early Action program. It can be seen on @stjoesmetuchen on Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter.
content.skills: Graphic Design, Typography Design, Social Media Management

content.title: Luminary Ad
content.description: This graphic was used to promote our luminary sale for the Saint Joseph High School 2022 advent mass. It linked back to an online form where families could have a loved one’s name placed on one of the surrounding luminaries. It can be seen on @stjoesmetuchen on Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter.
content.skills: Graphic Design, Typography Design, Social Media Management

content.title: Celebratory Selfie
content.description: This photo was taken at the 2022 Commencement and Graduation for the seniors at Saint Joseph High School, showcasing a group of graduates celebration with a pre-ceremony selfie. It was used as the inside cover of the Summer 2022 edition of TODAY Magazine.
content.skills: DSLR Operation (Canon Rebel SL3), Photo Manipulation, Photo Processing, Event Photography

content.title: Sports Media Day
content.description: For every athletic season at Saint Joseph High School, my office coordinates a sports media day for varsity players. These photos are used across a wide variety of outlets, including social media, our school website, and publications. I acted as the primary photographer and editor capturing each sport, including this shot from a basketball team member.
content.skills: DSLR Operation (Canon Rebel SL3), Photo Manipulation, Photo Processing, Event Photography

content.title: Cabaret Performance
content.description: This photo was taken at the first ever Saint Joe’s Cabaret put on by the Saint Joseph Theatre Company. I photographed the whole event for yearbook and social media purposes, including a shot from a student solo performance.
content.skills: DSLR Operation (Canon Rebel SL3), Photo Manipulation, Photo Processing, Event Photography

content.title: Pondering Portrait
content.description: This photo was taken of a classmate in my Imaging class at RIT. We were learning about the equipment and processing required for portrait photography as part of a class project.
content.skills: DSLR Operation (Canon Rebel SL3), Photo Manipulation, Photo Processing, Studio Photography

content.title: SJ Universe
content.description: This image was created to be the cover of the 2022 Admissions Viewbook. I processed photos in Adobe Lightroom and created this compilation in Adobe Photoshop. It features photos from throughout the previous school year taken by myself and a number of other photographers.
content.skills: Photo Manipulation, Photo Processing

content.title: Christmas Card
content.description: The cover of the Saint Joseph High School 2023 Christmas card was a really fun project to work on. I was asked to take a summertime photo from a freelance photographer and make it fit the winter-time feel and radiance of a Christmas display. Through numerous editing techniques and revisions, the final image captures the Christmas spirit in an entirely new experience.
content.skills: Photo Manipulation, Photo Processing

content.title: Gala Jumbotron
content.description: This graphic was put on the jumbotron screen across from the Heldrich Hotel in New Brunswick, NJ during Saint Joseph High School’s Green Tie Gala fundraiser. It was used to congratulate Kevin M. Ryan, CEO of Covenant House International, who was the 2022 honoree at the gala.
content.skills: Graphic Design, Typography Design

content.title: Lent Display Sign
content.description: This graphic was put up on Saint Joseph High School’s electronic display sign in the front of the campus. I often create seasonal and holiday-based signs for the school, and this one was used to celebrate the beginning of Lent. I created the ash cross in Adobe Illustrator.
content.skills: Graphic Design, Typography Design

content.title: NBA Display Sign
content.description: This graphic was put up on Saint Joseph High School’s electronic display sign in the front of the campus. It was used to congratulate Karl Anthony Towns, a graduate from Saint Joe’s who has a career in the NBA and notably earned the title of All Star.
content.skills: Graphic Design, Typography Design, Photo Manipulation

content.title: Advent Display Sign
content.description: This graphic was put up on Saint Joseph High School’s electronic display sign in the front of the campus. It was used to commemorate the life of Brother Ronald Cairns, S.C., a longtime Partner in Mission who had recently passed away. The annual Advent Community Mass was held in recognition of his life, and the graphic was used to promote the mass.
content.skills: Graphic Design, Typography Design

content.title: Wrestling Display Sign
content.description: This graphic was put up on Saint Joseph High School’s electronic display sign in the front of the campus. It was used to celebrate the accomplishments of our wrestling team for winning a county championship.
content.skills: Graphic Design, Typography Design

content.title: Football Display Sign
content.description: This graphic was put up on Saint Joseph High School’s electronic display sign in the front of the campus. As a high school, we often celebrate our students’ accomplishments with recognition on the display sign. This was one entry in a series of promoting our senior athletes who signed on to play at the collegiate level.
content.skills: Graphic Design, Typography Design, Photo Manipulation
